Definition at line 45 of file Units.cpp.

◆ exponents()

Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1> exponents ( ) const
inline

Returns the exponents associated with the base units.

This is a 7 component vector corresponding to the exponents for length, mass, time, electric current, thermodynamic temperature, amount of substance, and luminous intensity.

Definition at line 89 of file Units.h.

◆ factor()

double factor ( ) const
inline

Returns the factor associated with this units type.

The factor corresponds to ratio between the base units and this units. For example, converting cm to m requires dividing by 100, thus the factor is 0.01.
